## hpr2470 :: Obamacare Update At The End Of 2017

 In 2017 Obamacare was the subject of a great deal of political jockeying, and yet by the end of the year almost nothing changed. So what happened, and why?

https://www.foxbusiness.com/politics/2017/06/26/gop-donors-close-checkbooks-frustrated-with-lack-progress-on-taxes-health-care.html
https://fortune.com/2017/12/21/obamacare-enrollment-surge-despite-trump/
https://www.washingtonpost.com/blogs/plum-line/wp/2017/12/27/republicans-failure-on-health-care-is-even-greater-than-they-realize/
